short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay updated with the latest blockchain news and crypto influencers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gathers crypto and blockchain news in a single place, in the future updates it will allow the user to toggle tweets and threads from KOLs and influencers in the crypto space.
